unpair.title: Unpair
unpair.warningTitle: Are you sure you want to unpair?
unpair.warningText:
Unpairing will disconnect you from your partner,
and some data may become inaccessible.
unpair.recoveryHint: Data can be recovered within 30 days
unpair.warning1: Your partner will be notified of the disconnection
unpair.warning2: Mission history is kept in individual accounts
unpair.warning3: You can reconnect with the same partner within 30 days
unpair.confirmPrompt:
To continue, please type 'unpair'
exactly as shown below
unpair.successMessage:
You have been unpaired.
Reconnect with the same partner within 30 days to recover your data.
unpair.notificationBody: {{nickname}} has unpaired from you. Reconnect within 30 days to recover your data.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.dataList: Data to be deleted: Profile information, Couple connection info, Completed mission records, Albums and photos, All settings
deleteAccount.successMessage:
All data has been deleted.
Thank you for using our service.
deleteAccount.error: An error occurred while deleting your account.

In test mode, data is stored locally only and will not sync with the server.

Use this only for development testing.
